desc: Birchrun Hills Farm is a small family owned and operated dairy farm in the beautiful hills of Chester Springs, PA. The Miller family creates award winning cheeses from their herd of 80 Holstein cows. The family cares for these wonderful animals and land which adds to the flavors of Birchrun Hills high quality cheeses.

layout.text:
From Our Farm to Your Family's Table
Pasture-raised foods you can eat with confidence
